# Welcome, Prospective Students!

<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-2">
<p style="text-align:center;"><img src="/images/culogo.png"></p>
</div>
<div class="col-md-10">**We're thrilled that you're here!** On this site, you will find everything you need to help you navigate through your (virtual) Prospective Student Visit with the [Columbia University Psychology Department](https://psychology.columbia.edu/){target="_blank"}. 

If any questions arise during your visit, please feel free reach out to us any time, either using our [Slack channel](https://slack.com){target="_blank"}, or by contacting one of the Prospectives Visit coordinators via email: [Jacob Edwards](mailto:je2527@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}, [Manasi Jayakumar](mailto:mj2873@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}, and [Anna Vannucci](mailto:av2902@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}.
</div>
</div>
